name: Sample Paint Bucket
description: This is a sample product description.

name: EMULSION BRILLIANT WHITE 20L
description:
Product Details Of WHITE by JAT Interior Emulsion :- 
 * Coverage up to 225 sq. Feet per Litre.
 * Touch dry in 15-30 minutes.
 * Can be recoated in 2-4 hours.
 * Can be applied with a brush or roller.
 * Can be diluted up to 50% of water by volume of paint.

name: EMULSION BRILLIANT WHITE 4L
description:
Exterior Emulsion Brilliant White Paint

* Exterior emulsion brilliant white paint is a high-quality, weather-resistant coating designed for outdoor surfaces. It provides a bright, clean, and long-lasting white finish while protecting walls from harsh environmental conditions such as rain, UV rays, and dirt accumulation.
